## ReplicationSummaryCard
ReplicationSummaryCard components

**Params**

| Param | Type | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [title] | <code>string</code> | <code>null</code> | The title to be displayed on the top left corner of the card. |
| replicationDetails | <code>DS.Model.replicationDetails</code> | <code></code> | An Ember data object off the Ember data model.  It is computed at the parent component and passed through to this component. |
